mapper.select: SELECT message.id AS id, message.userId AS userId, message.userMessage AS userMessage, message.imagesUrl AS imagesUrl, message.createTime AS createTime, (SELECT user.nickName from tbl_user AS user where message.userId=user.id) as nickName, (SELECT user.imageUrl from tbl_user AS user where message.userId=user.id) as imageUrl FROM tbl_message AS message where message.userId=#{userId}
